hobbies.name: Running and any kind of exercising
hobbies.description: Since I discovered the positive effects of exercising, I started practicing it regularly. Running in nature is my favorite.

hobbies.name: Eating
hobbies.description: I'm not sure if I started running because I love to eat, or I eat because I need fuel to exercise! It doesn't even matter in the end. One of my favorite cuisines are Indian and Mexican, but any vegan dish would do.

hobbies.name: Baking
hobbies.description: When I'm not out running or eating, I enjoy baking. I bake anything from sourdough bread to banana bread (some of my former colleagues will probably remember me fondly because I like to bring cake to the office).

hobbies.name: Nature
hobbies.description: I feel free when I see mountains and the infinite sky.
